update xm_tuihuos set tuihuoname = #{tuihuoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tuihuodate = #{tuihuodate,jdbcType=DATE}, tuihuostatus = #{tuihuostatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tuihuoperson = #{tuihuoperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customernum = #{customernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tuihuoreason = #{tuihuoreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cangkusid = #{cangkusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency_rate = #{currencyRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where tuihuosid = #{tuihuosid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_tuihuos LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_tuihuos.smownerid LEFT OUTER JOIN xm_account ON xm_account.accountid = xm_tuihuos.accountid WHERE 1=1 ${filter}

select xm_tuihuos.*,xm_users.user_name FROM xm_tuihuos LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_tuihuos.smownerid LEFT OUTER JOIN xm_account ON xm_account.accountid = xm_tuihuos.accountid WHERE 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}
